A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I understand what it was trying to say\, but failed to deliver that message. Messy\, unfinished storylines beyond Rey and Kylo\, who were the highpoints. Didn't love the assassination of Luke's character. Honestly\, it read more like Rian Johnson's Star Wars fanfic\, than it did a Star Wars movie. Well made\, just not my favorite direction for the story.
